item.description:
The theme for this group is promoting your local business using the latest and greatest tools the Internet has to offer. Bring your stories, share and learn.

Meeting agenda:
1. Introductions
2. I will be presenting my startup, TrustedOnes, and in particular, how it can benefit your small business. In case you're concerned, I'm not selling anything :-). Actually, you can still get a free-for-life business account on TrustedOnes.com.
3. Bring your business cards, ...networking!


We have a presenter for the meeting after - thanks Tom! More details to follow, and I hope that more of you will take the opportunity to showcase your business in the upcoming meetings (hint - email me).

Thanks,
-arno
item.how_to_find_us: It should be easy - we are in the "Watertown Savings Bank" room
item.name: Greater Boston Area - Small Business Support Network February Meetup
